name: Add new Airtable records for every form submission from Elementor
description: Streamline your lead management process by automatically creating records in Airtable whenever a new form is submitted through Elementor. This template ensures that all your form submissions are captured and organized in Airtable, allowing for efficient tracking and follow-up. Set up your Elementor forms to collect the necessary data, and watch as Make seamlessly transfers this information to Airtable, enhancing your workflow and improving your data management.
